com.brightcove.player.mediacontroller

Interface BrightcoveControlBar

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ShowHideController
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BrightcoveControlBarImpl

    public interface BrightcoveControlBar
extends ShowHideController
    Defines the operations which a control bar must provide. Using and customizing: Applications can tailor the media controls displayed on the control bar by providing their own XML layout script for the presentation and/or by providing their own control bar class that implements this interface.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String CONTROL_BAR_CREATED
      The event type emitted by the Brightcove media controller that provides for customization.

        Obtains a control bar child view by resource identifier.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
